name: Warlock Mayhem
description:
Summary

Warlocks are wreaking havoc and you have been tasked to handle them. Make use of the items around you and defeat the warlocks!

Controls
  • WASD to move.
  • Left Mouse Button to attack.
  • Spacebar to dodge.
  • P to pause and display controls and tips.
  • I to show inventory.
Hints
  • Walk over items in the level to add them to your inventory.
  • Move items around in the inventory by dragging the icons.
  • Craft by clicking the craft button when there are items in the crafting section.
    • Try combining a rock and a stick and see what happens.
  • Drag the item to the weapon slot to equip it.
  • Weapons can break after a number of uses, so use items wisely. 
Credits
  • Background Music by:
    • SubspaceAudio(Juhani Junkala)
    •  https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-music 
  • Attack Swish SFX by:
    •  artisticdude
    • https://opengameart.org/content/swishes-sound-pack
